name: TapTap Ski
description:
Clear the gates and head down the mountain in this arcade racing classic.

Dodge, dip, duck and dive between the flags on this black diamond slalom course.

Collect a wide range of cool characters, each with their own characteristics.

Avoid rocks, boulders and heavily wooded areas.

Simple controls change direction each time you tap, making it instantly accessible.

Plan your route carefully so you don’t end up crashing in spectacular fashion.

It’s not recommended that you play TapTap Ski while actually skiing.
